anya-e0803n13:3_0: Yā hi sā heṭṭhā amhehi eka dviti catuiccetesaṁ saṅkhyāsabbanāmānaṁ nāmikapadamālā kathitā,
anya-e0803n13:3_1: taṁ ṭhapetvā idha asabbanāmānaṁ pañca cha sattādīnaṁ saṅkhyānāmānaṁ nāmikapadamālā bhūdhātumayehi aññehi ca rūpehi yojanatthaṁ vuccate –
anya-e0803n13:4_1: Sattannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ vasena ñeyyaṁ. ‘‘Pañca bhūtā, pañca abhibhavitāro, pañca purisā, pañca bhūmiyo, pañca kaññāyo, pañca bhūtāni,
anya-e0803n13:4_2: pañca cittānī’’tiādinā sabbattha yojetabbaṁ. Cha, chahi, chabhi, channaṁ, chasu, chassu itipi. ‘‘Chassu loko samuppanno,
anya-e0803n13:4_3: chassu krubbati santhava’’nti hi pāḷi. Satta, sattahi, sattabhi, sattannaṁ, sattasu. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhabhi, aṭṭhannaṁ, aṭṭhasu. Nava, navahi, navabhi, navannaṁ, navasu. Dasa, dasahi, dasabhi, dasannaṁ, dasasu. Evaṁ ekādasa. Dvādasa, bārasa. Terasa, tedasa, teḷasa. Catuddasa, cuddasa. Pañcadasa, pannarasa. Soḷasa. Sattarasa. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhārasahi, aṭṭhārasabhi, aṭṭhārasannaṁ, aṭṭhārasasu.
anya-e0803n13:5_0: Ekūnavīsati, ekūnavīsaṁ iccādipi. Ekūnavīsāya, ekūnavīsāyaṁ, ekūnavīsa bhikkhū tiṭṭhanti, ekūnavīsaṁ bhikkhū passati,
anya-e0803n13:5_2: Ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūhi dhammo desito, ekūnavīsāya kaññāhi kataṁ, ekūnavīsāya cittehi kataṁ,
anya-e0803n13:5_5: ekūnavīsāya cittānaṁ ruccati, ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūhi apeti . Evaṁ kaññāhi cittehi.
anya-e0803n13:5_6: Ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūnaṁ santakaṁ, evaṁ kaññānaṁ cittānaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:5_8: Evaṁ ‘‘kaññāsu cittesū’’ti yojetabbaṁ. Ekūnavīsati, ekūnavīsatiṁ, ekūnavīsatiyā, ekūnavīsatiyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:6_0: Vīsati, vīsatiṁ, vīsatiyā, vīsatiyaṁ. Vīsa, vīsaṁ, vīsāya, vīsāyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:6_1: Tathā ekavīsa dvāvīsa bāvīsa tevīsa catuvīsa iccādīsupi. Tiṁsa, tiṁsaṁ, tiṁsāya, tiṁsāyaṁ. Cattālīsa, cattālīsaṁ, cattālīsāya, cattālīsāyaṁ. Cattārīsa iccādipi. Paññāsa, paññāsaṁ, paññāsāya, paññāsāyaṁ. Paṇṇāsa, paṇṇāsaṁ, paṇṇāsāya, paṇṇāsāyaṁ. Saṭṭhi, saṭṭhiṁ, saṭṭhiyā, saṭṭhiyaṁ. Sattati, sattatiṁ, sattatiyā, sattatiyaṁ. Sattari iccādipi. Asīti, asītiṁ, asītiyā, asītiyaṁ. Navuti. Navutiṁ, navutiyā, navutiyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:7_0: Itthañca aññathāpi saṅkhyārūpāni gahetabbāni. Ekūnavīsehi, ekūnavīsānaṁ, ekūnavīsesu.
anya-e0803n13:7_1: ‘‘Channavutīna’’nti ca ādināpi saṅkhyārūpānaṁ katthaci dassanato keci saddasatthavidū ūnavīsatisaddaṁ sabbadāpi ekavacanantamitthiliṅgameva payuñjanti.
anya-e0803n13:7_2: Keci ‘‘vīsatiādayo ānavuti ekavacanantā itthiliṅgā’’ti vadanti. Keci panāhu –
anya-e0803n13:10_1: Sabbesampi ca tesaṁ yathāvuttavacanaṁ kiñci pāḷippadesaṁ patvā yujjati,
anya-e0803n13:10_2: kiñci pana patvā na yujjati vīsativīsaṁtiṁsaṁiccādīnañhi saṅkhatthānaṁ saddānaṁ bahuvacanappayogavasenapi pāḷiyaṁ dassanato ,
anya-e0803n13:10_4: Tasmā yathāsambhavaṁ yathāpāvacanañca itthiliṅgabhāve tesamekavacanantatā veditabbā atthi natthisaddānaṁ viya.
anya-e0803n13:11_0: Atthinatthisaddā hi nipātattā ekattepi bahuttepi pavattanti ‘‘puttā matthi dhanammatthi. Natthi attasamaṁ pemaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:11_3: Abhidhamme hi dhammasenāpatinā anudhammacakkavattinā vohārakusalena vohārakusalasādhakena ‘‘atthiyā nava.
anya-e0803n13:11_5: tasmā vīsativīsatimiccādīnampi yathāsambhavaṁ yathāpāvacanañca itthiliṅgabhāve ekavacanantatā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n13:12_0: Tattheke ‘‘hetuyā adhipatiyā’’ti ca idaṁ liṅgavipallāsavasena gahetabbaṁ maññanti.
anya-e0803n13:12_3: Atha vā ‘‘hetuyā adhipatiyā’’ti dvayamidaṁ itthiliṅgarūpapaṭibhāgaṁ pulliṅgarūpanti gahetabbaṁ ‘‘hetuyo jantuyo’’tiādīnaṁ itthiliṅgarūpapaṭibhāgānaṁ pulliṅgarūpānampi vijjamānattā,
anya-e0803n13:12_4: ‘‘atthiyā natthiyā’’ti idaṁ pana liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti na gahetabbaṁ atthi natthisaddānaṁ aliṅgabhedattā.
anya-e0803n13:12_5: Na hi atthi natthisaddā tīsu liṅgesu ekasmimpi antogadhā.
anya-e0803n13:12_6: Etesu hi atthisaddo ākhyātanipātavasena bhijjati ‘‘atthi santi saṁvijjati.
anya-e0803n13:12_8: Iccevaṁ atthi natthisaddānaṁ nipātānañca liṅgavacanavasena kathanaṁ yujjati itthiliṅgādivasena ekattādivasena ca appavattanato. Vuttañca –
anya-e0803n13:14_0: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, yaṁ na byeti tadabyaya’’nti.
anya-e0803n13:15_0: Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho ‘‘atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā’’ti vacanato atthisaddo paṭhamāya vibhattiyā yutto,
anya-e0803n13:15_1: evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘sadisaṁ tīsu liṅgesū’’tiādi vuttanti?
anya-e0803n13:15_3: tathā natthisaddo atthisaddassa vacanalesena gahetabbattā yugaḷapadattā ca.
anya-e0803n13:15_4: Idaṁ pana ‘‘sadisaṁ tīsu liṅgesū’’tiādivacanaṁ upasagganipātasaṅkhāte asaṅkhyāsadde sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:15_6: Tathā hi ‘‘asaṅkhyā’’ti ca ‘‘abyayā’’ti ca laddhavohāresu upasagganipātesu upasaggā sabbepi sabbavibhattivacanakā.
anya-e0803n13:15_7: Nipātānaṁ pana ekacce paṭhamādīsu yathārahaṁ vibhattiyuttā, ekacce avibhattiyuttā.
anya-e0803n13:15_8: Tattha ye yadaggena vibhattiyuttā, te tadaggena tabbacanakā.
anya-e0803n13:15_9: Upasagganipātesu hi paccekaṁ ‘‘idaṁ nāma vacana’’nti laddhuṁ na sakkā,
anya-e0803n13:15_10: sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana ‘‘sadisaṁ tīsu liṅgesū’’tiādi pubbācariyehi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:15_12: Na hi āvusosaddato sabbāpi vibhattiyo labbhanti,
anya-e0803n13:15_13: atha kho ālapanatthavācakattā ekavacanikaanekavacanikā paṭhamāvibhattiyoyeva labbhanti. Ayamasmākaṁ khanti.
anya-e0803n13:16_0: Keci pana sabbehipi nipātehi sabbavibhattilopaṁ vadanti, taṁ na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:16_2: Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāya ca dutiyāya cā’’tiādivacanato,
anya-e0803n13:16_3: padapūraṇamattānañca avibhattiyuttānaṁ atha khalu vata vatha iccādīnaṁ nipātānaṁ vacanato.
anya-e0803n13:16_4: Etthāpi siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho avibhattiyuttānampi nipātānaṁ sambhavato atthi natthisaddānaṁ avibhattiko niddeso kātabbo,
anya-e0803n13:17_0: Yadi evaṁ ‘‘atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā’’ti vacanato atthi natthisaddā luttāya paṭhamāya vibhattiyā vasena paṭhamāvibhattikāyeva niddisitabbā,
anya-e0803n13:17_1: evamakatvā kasmā sattamyantavasena ‘‘atthiyā natthiyā’’ti niddiṭṭhāti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:17_2: atthi natthisaddā paṭhamāvibhattiyuttāyeva niddisitabbā, tathāpi ‘‘atthipaccaye nava,
anya-e0803n13:17_3: natthipaccaye navā’’ti etassatthassa paridīpane paṭhamāya okāso natthi, sattamiyāyeva pana atthi, tasmā ‘‘atthiyā nava, natthiyā navā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:17_4: Iti atthiyānatthiyāsaddānaṁ sattamyantabhāve siddheyeva tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhiyantabhāvopi siddhoyeva hoti.
anya-e0803n13:17_5: Tasmā ‘‘atthibhāvo atthitā’’tiādīsupi atthiyā bhāvo atthibhāvo, natthiyā bhāvo natthibhāvo,
anya-e0803n13:17_6: atthiyā bhāvo atthitābhiādinā samāsataddhitaviggaho avassamicchitabbo. Yadidamamhehi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:17_7: taṁ ‘‘pāḷiyā virujjhatī’’ti na vattabbaṁ pāḷinayānusārena vuttattāti.
anya-e0803n13:18_5: Yathā hi vīsatiiccādīnaṁ saṅkhyāsaddānaṁ sarūpato adabbavācakattepi dabbavācakānaṁ latāmatirattiitthī yāguvadhūsaddānaṁ viya itthiliṅgabhāvo saddasatthavidūhi anumato,
anya-e0803n13:18_6: evaṁ adabbavācakattepi atthi natthisaddānaṁ katthaci itthiliṅgabhāvo saddhammavidūhi anumato.
anya-e0803n13:18_7: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati ‘‘atthiyā nava, natthiyā navā’’ti. Atha vā ‘‘atthiyā,
anya-e0803n13:18_8: natthiyā’’ti imāni liṅgabhāvavinimuttāni sattamiyantāni nipātapadānītipi gahetabbāni, na ettha codetabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:18_9: evarūpāni nipātapadāni pubbācariyehi vuttāni na santi,
anya-e0803n13:19_0: Pāvacanasmiñhi garūhi aniddiṭṭhānipi anekavihitāni nipātapadāni sandissanti, nāpi ‘‘hetuyā, adhipatiyā, atthiyā,
anya-e0803n13:19_2: Na hi acinteyyānubhāvena pāramitāpuññena nipphannena anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbaṁ ñeyyamaṇḍalaṁ hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya paccakkhaṁ katvā passato buddhassa vacane aññesaṁ vācāvippalāpo avassaṁ labbhatīti. Nanu ca bho ‘‘hetuyā, adhipatiyā, atthiyā,
anya-e0803n13:19_3: natthiyā’’ti ca idaṁ sāriputtattheravacanaṁ tena nikkhittattā.
anya-e0803n13:19_4: Tathāgatena hi tāvatiṁsabhapane desitakāle imāni padāni na santi,
anya-e0803n13:19_5: evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘buddhavacana’’nti vadathāti? Buddhavacanaṁyeva nāma.
anya-e0803n13:19_6: Āyasmato hi sāriputtassa tathāgatena nayo dinno,
anya-e0803n13:19_7: tenapi pabhinnapaṭisambhidena satthukappena aggasāvakena satthu santikā nayaṁ labhitvā byañjanaṁ suropitaṁ kataṁ.
anya-e0803n13:19_8: Sabbepi hi paṭisambhidappattā ariyā dunniruttiṁ na vadanti niruttipabhedasmiṁ sukusalattā,
anya-e0803n13:19_9: tasmā aññesamavisayo esa ariyānaṁ vohāroti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:21_0: Sataṁ, satāni, satā. Sataṁ, satāni, sate. Satena, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṁ. Satā, satasmā, satamhā, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṁ. Sate, satasmiṁ, satamhi, satesu. Evaṁ sahassaṁ, sahassānīti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:21_1: Dasasahassaṁ satasahassaṁ dasasatasahassanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0803n13:21_2: Ayaṁ panettha payogo ‘‘sataṁ bhikkhū, sataṁ itthiyo, sataṁ cittāni. Bhikkhūnaṁ sataṁ, itthīnaṁ sataṁ, cittānaṁ sataṁ. Sahassādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0803n13:21_3: Itthañca aññathāpi saddarūpāni bhavanti. Koṭi, koṭī, koṭiyo. Rattinayena ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:23_0: Saṅkhyā tāva sā saṅkhyeyya-ppadhānāti garū vaduṁ.
anya-e0803n13:24_0: Vīsatito yāva satā, yā saṅkhyā tāva sā pana;
anya-e0803n13:27_0: Vīsato yāva koṭiyā, saṅkhyā tāva hi sā khalu;
anya-e0803n13:29_0: Tathā hi ‘‘asīti koṭiyo hitvā, hiraññassāpi pabbaji’’nti, ‘‘khīṇāsavā vītamalā,
anya-e0803n13:30_0: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne sabbesaṁ saṅkhyāsaddarūpānaṁ pākaṭīkaraṇena viññūnaṁ sukhumañāṇapaṭilābhatthaṁ sāṭṭhakathaṁ udānapāḷippadesaṁ aññañca pāḷippadesamaṭṭhakathāvacanañca āharitvā dassayissāmi –
anya-e0803n13:31_0: ‘‘Yesaṁ kho visākhe sataṁ piyāni, sataṁ tesaṁ dukkhāni, yesaṁ navuti piyāni, navuti tesaṁ dukkhāni.
anya-e0803n13:31_1: Yesaṁ asīti…pe… yesaṁ sattati. Yesaṁ saṭṭhi. Yesaṁ paññāsaṁ, yesaṁ cattārīsaṁ, yesaṁ tiṁsaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:31_2: Yesaṁ kho visākhe vīsaṁ piyāni, vīsati tesaṁ dukkhāni. Yesaṁ dasa. Yesaṁ nava. Yesaṁ aṭṭha. Yesaṁ satta. Yesaṁ cha. Yesaṁ pañca. Yesaṁ cattāri. Yesaṁ tīṇi. Yesaṁ dve. Yesaṁ ekaṁ piyaṁ, tesaṁ ekaṁ dukkha’’nti.
anya-e0803n13:32_2: Ettha ca yasmā ekato paṭṭhāya yāva dasa,
anya-e0803n13:32_6: dasa tesaṁ dukkhāna’’ntiādinā paṭhanti, taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0803n13:32_7: Yasmā pana vīsatito paṭṭhāya yāva sataṁ,
anya-e0803n13:32_9: tasmā tatthāpi saṅkhyeyyappadhānaṁyeva gahetvā ‘‘yesaṁ kho visākhe sataṁ piyāni,
anya-e0803n13:32_11: Sabbesampi ca yesaṁ ekaṁ piyaṁ, ekaṁ tesaṁ dukkhanti pāṭho, na pana dukkhassāti.
anya-e0803n13:32_12: Ekasmiñhi padakkame ekarasāva bhagavato desanā hotīti.
anya-e0803n13:33_0: Idāni añño pāḷippadeso aṭṭhakathāpāṭhappadeso ca nīyate –
anya-e0803n13:37_2: tasmā sataṁsaddaṁ sahassasaddena yojetvā ‘‘hatthī’’tiādīni pana upapadaṁ katvā attho gahetabbo. Hatthī sataṁ sahassāni. Assā sataṁ sahassāni.
anya-e0803n13:37_6: Saṅkhyāppadhānavasena pana ayampi attho gahetabbo ‘‘hatthīnaṁ satasahassaṁ, assānaṁ satasahassaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:37_9: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. ‘‘Yojanānaṁ satānucco,
anya-e0803n13:37_11: Ettha ‘‘pañcā’’ti saddaṁ satasaddena saddhiṁ yojetvā ‘‘sippikānaṁ sataṁ natthī’’ti ettha viya himavā pabbato yojanānaṁ pañca satāni uccoti saṅkhyāppadhānavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:37_13: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. Satamiti saddo ‘‘sataṁ homi,
anya-e0803n13:37_19: ‘‘Parosahassaṁ kho panassa puttā bhavissantī’’ti ettha sahassanti bahuvacananti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:40_1: Ettha ‘‘kappe ca satasahasse caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti sāmiatthe upayogabahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:40_2: tasmā ‘‘mahākappānaṁ satasahassānaṁ catunnaṁ asaṅkhiyānaṁ matthake’’ti attho gahetabbo,
anya-e0803n13:40_5: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:42_0: Etthantare yaṁ caritaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ bodhipācana’’nti
anya-e0803n13:43_2: ‘‘Satasahasse kappe’’ti kappasaddasambandhena cāyaṁ pulliṅganiddeso upayoganiddeso ca.
anya-e0803n13:43_4: ‘‘Caturo ca asaṅkhiye’’ti acchantasaṁyogavasena upayogabahuvacanāni. Kassa pana asaṅkhiyeti?
anya-e0803n13:43_5: Aññassa avuttattā kappassa ca vuttattā pakaraṇato ‘‘kappāna’’nti ayamattho viññāyateva.
anya-e0803n13:43_6: Na hi vuttaṁ vajjetvā avuttassa kassaci gahaṇaṁ yuttanti.
anya-e0803n13:43_7: Casaddo sampiṇḍanattho ‘‘mahākappānaṁ caturo asaṅkhyeyye satasahasse ca mahākappe’’ti.
anya-e0803n13:43_8: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:44_1: kumbhīnañca satā bahū’’ti pāḷi. Ettha ghaṭāti ghaṭānaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:44_4: Kumbhīnañca satā bahūti anekāni ca kumbhīnaṁ satāni. Ettha nikāralopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n13:44_5: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:47_4: tena ‘‘ekassa ceva dvinnañca tiṇṇaṁ catunnaṁ…pe… dasanna’’ntiādinā nayena asaṅkhyeyyoti attho.
anya-e0803n13:47_5: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:50_1: Ettha cattāri satasahassānīti idaṁ liṅgabhedavasena ‘‘chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā’’ti imehi dvīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:50_2: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyya vācakopi saddo napuṁsakova hoti,
anya-e0803n13:50_3: tasmā ‘‘cattāri satasahassānī’’ti ca ‘‘chaḷabhiññā’’ti ca ‘‘mahiddhikā’’ti ca etaṁ padattayaṁ samānādhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:50_4: Atha vā chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṁ mahaddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:50_5: Imasmiṁ panatthe ‘‘cattāri satasahassānī’’ti ayaṁ saṅkhyāvacano bhavati. ‘‘Tīṇi satasahassāni,
anya-e0803n13:50_6: nāriyo samalaṅkatā’’tiādīsupi ayaṁ nayo netabbo. ‘‘Tā ca satta satā bhariyā,
anya-e0803n13:50_8: Ettha satāti ‘‘satānī’’ti napuṁsakavasena gahetabbaṁ, na itthiliṅgavasena.
anya-e0803n13:50_10: Itthiliṅgabhūtā hi satasaddo natthi, tathā pulliṅgabhūto.
anya-e0803n13:50_11: Yadi ca dviliṅgo satasaddo siyā , evañca sati ‘‘puriso,
anya-e0803n13:51_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā’’ti ettha satasaddo itthiliṅgo hutvā dissatīti? Na, napuṁsakoyevāti.
anya-e0803n13:51_1: Nanu ca bho devatāsaddena samānādhikaraṇoti? Saccaṁ samānādhikaraṇo, tathāpi napuṁsakoyeva.
anya-e0803n13:51_3: Tathā hi ‘‘pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciravāsino ahesu’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgena pulliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā dissati,
anya-e0803n13:51_4: tasmā ‘‘tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā’’ti etthāpi ‘‘sattasatānī’’ti napuṁsakabhāvoyevāti avagantabbo.
anya-e0803n13:51_6: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:52_1: Ettha ‘‘navutikoṭisahassehi bhikkhūhī’’ti vā ‘‘bhikkhūnaṁ navutikoṭisahassehī’’ti vā saṅkhyeyyasaṅkhyāpadhānavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:52_2: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:53_3: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:54_3: Ettha satasahassamhi kappeti satasahassānaṁ kappānaṁ matthake.
anya-e0803n13:54_4: Ekanavute kappeti ekanavutiyā kappānaṁ matthaketi bhummavacanassa sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:54_5: Tathā hi ‘‘bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’’ti ettha bhummavacanassa ‘‘bhagavato santike’’ti sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahito.
anya-e0803n13:54_6: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:56_0: Nevamhākaṁ bhayaṁ koci, vane vāḷesu vijjatī’’ti
anya-e0803n13:57_1: Ayametassā attho – tattha vane vāḷānaṁ sahassāni ca satāni ca nahutāni ca yadi vijjanti.
anya-e0803n13:57_3: vāḷānaṁ satasahassāni ca nahutāni ca yadi vijjanti,
anya-e0803n13:57_5: Kocisaddo hi ‘‘ko te balaṁ mahārājā’’ti ettha kosaddo viya kvasaddatthe vattati, nimittatthe cāyaṁ niddeso.
anya-e0803n13:57_6: Tena ‘‘koci kvaci kismiñci vāḷe ekassapi vāḷamigassa kāraṇā nevamhākaṁ bhayaṁ vijjatī’’ti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:57_9: Vāḷānaṁ kāraṇā appamattakampi amhākaṁ bhayaṁ na vijjatīti.
anya-e0803n13:57_10: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:60_1: Ettha yasmā saddato samānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṁ padānaṁ asamānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṁ vā atthato pana samānānaṁ dūre ṭhitānampi ekasambandho hoti,
anya-e0803n13:60_5: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:63_3: Tathā hi ‘‘satasahassāni nahutāni cā’’ti imāni ‘‘duve cattārī’’ti imehi visesitabbattā ‘‘dvisatasahassaṁ catunahuta’’nti atthappakāsanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n13:63_4: Evaṁ santepi ‘‘duve’’iccādīnaṁ saṅkhyāsaddānaṁ ‘‘satasahassānī’’tiādīhi saṅkhyāsaddehi samānādhikaraṇatā pubbācariyehi na vuttā.
anya-e0803n13:63_6: Satasahassaṁ bhikkhū’’tiādīsu samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati dabbavācakattā visesitabbapadānaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:63_8: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā yuttiyā abhāvato. Yadi evaṁ ‘‘kusalā, rūpaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:64_2: Ubhayena imamatthaṁ dasseti ‘‘ayaṁ vasundharā bahalattena yojanānaṁ duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca ettakaṁ saṅkhātā’’ti.
anya-e0803n13:64_3: ‘‘Ettaka’’nti padassa ca ‘‘duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni cā’’ti imehi vā ‘‘vasundharā’’ti iminā vā samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā.
anya-e0803n13:64_7: Apica ‘‘duve satasahassāni cattāri na hutāni cā’’ti imesampi ‘‘vasundharā’’ti iminā samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā ‘‘bhikkhūnaṁ sata’’nti ettha satasaddassa viya saṅkhyāvacanamattattā.
anya-e0803n13:64_9: ‘‘Saṅkhātā’’ti pana ‘‘aya’’nti ca imesaṁ ‘‘vasundharā’’ti iminā samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati.
anya-e0803n13:64_10: Sabbopāyaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:66_0: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā tā catuddasā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:67_1: Ettha cha piṅgalā pannarasāti cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalā rājiyoti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:70_0: Asīti dasa eko ca, indanāmā mahabbalā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:71_1: Ettha pana ‘‘ekanavutī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘asīti dasa eko cā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:71_3: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:73_0: Yesaṁ samaṁ na passāmi, kevalaṁ mahi’maṁ cara’’nti
anya-e0803n13:74_1: Ettha ‘‘purisānaṁ tiṁsasahassāni navuti ca satāni tiṁsa nāvutyo’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n13:74_2: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne tiṁsasaddato sahassasaddassa navutisaddato ca satasaddassa lopaṁ katvā ‘‘tiṁsa nāvutyo’’ti vuttanti na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:74_3: Evañhi gahaṇe sati yattha katthacipi edisī saddaracanā kātabbā siyā,
anya-e0803n13:74_4: katāya ca edisāya saddaracanāya atthāvagamo vinā upadesena suṇantānaṁ na siyā, tasmā nevaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:74_5: Evaṁ pana gahetabbaṁ – ‘‘tiṁsa nāvutyo’’ti idaṁ lokasaṅketarūḷhaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:74_6: saṅketarūḷhassa pana vacanassattho yasmā gahitapubbasaṅketehi sutvā ñāyate, na upadesato,
anya-e0803n13:74_7: tasmā brahmadattena raññā vuttakālepi satthārā taṁ kathaṁ āharitvā vuttakālepi sabbe manussā vināpi upadesena vacanatthaṁ jānantīti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:75_0: Tiṁsañceva sahassāni, navuti ca satāni tu;
anya-e0803n13:77_0: Yasmā pāvacane santi, nayā ceva acintiyā;
anya-e0803n13:80_0: Upadesaṁ sadā gaṇhe, garuṁ sammā upaṭṭhahaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:87_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
